Judul: SOLID DYNAMICS SIMULATION USING TOTAL LAGRANGIAN FORMULATION WITH SPH AND DC PSE
Abstrak:
Discretization correction particle strength exchange or DC PSE is a particlebased
discretization operator. In the last few years, DC PSE not only implemented
in fluids dynamics but also in structure simulation. In this thesis,
DC PSE will be used in solid dynamics simulation replacing SPH that already
done by (Wiragunarsa, 2019) in 2019.
Practically, there is a stabilisation issue when DC PSE is used to solve momentum
equation, therefore, momentum equation has to solved using SPH and
DC PSE only used to solve deformation gradient tensor equation. However,
the existence of DC PSE has a good effect on the simulation compared to only
using standard SPH, it can be seen from both kernel testing.
In this thesis, the simulation code that has been made, is used to performs
simulation in two dimensional and three dimensional cases, which will be compared
to analytical result and another previous simulation results. The simulated
cases include geometrically nonlinear bending analysis (Lin et al., 2015),
free vibration (Inman and Singh, 1994), and twist angle of rectangular column
with torsion load (Young, Budynas, Sadegh, et al., 2002). .
Kata Kunci: DC PSE, SPH, Solid dynamics simulation
